roleset.name: get back
roleset.note: RETRIEVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'retrieve' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 13.5.2 'obtain'. (from retrieve.01-v predicate notes)
RETRIEVAL-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to retrieve.01. Retrieve.01 is a member of VN class obtain-13.5.2. Framed by Katie. (from retrieval.01-n)

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: ``The cost (of magnetic stimulators) would seem like peanuts if we could retrieve limb function'' in such people, Dr. Tator says.

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: He showed an unbroken, still-ticking pocket watch that he retrieved *trace* for one woman.
example.arg: that -> an unbroken, still-ticking pocket watch

example.name: passive
example.text: He said that Oliver North of Iran-Contra notoriety thought he had erased his computer but that [the information]-1 was later retrieved *trace*-1 for congressional committees to read.

example.name: with source
example.text: John retrieved his teddy from Mary. Teddy BEAR! Teddy BEAR! Sheesh.
